column5: The programme integrates two aspects of business studies: management and entrepreneurship. It combines theory with practise as well as individual reflective thinking with collaborative learning. Leuphana University Lüneburg is generally known for linking research with industry and startup culture, and its engagement for a sustainable future.Interested in this programme? Join our digital information day on 16 November 2023 to learn more application requirements and the content of the programme. You can register
